metadata.name: HackTool - Default PowerSploit/Empire Scheduled Task Creation
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a schtask via PowerSploit or Empire Default Configuration.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\schtasks.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/create')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell.exe -noni')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tn updater /tr')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sc onlogon')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sc daily /st')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sc onidle')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sc hourly'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a schtask via PowerSploit or Empire Default Configuration.
